createUserForm.imageFormat: Accepted formats: png, jpeg or jpg

username.invalidSymbols: Username can only contains alphanumeric symbols and underscore('_') or dot('.').
username.invalidLength: Username must be between 4 and 100 characters.

password.invalidSymbols: Password can only contains alphanumeric symbols.
password.invalidLength: Password must be between 5 and 100 characters.

repeatedPassword.invalidSymbols: Repeat password can only contains alphanumeric symbols.
repeatedPassword.invalidLength: Repeat password must be between 5 and 100 characters.
repeatedPassword.passwordDoesNotMatch: Repeat password does not match password.

firstName.invalidSymbols: First name can only contains alphabetic characters and spaces.
firstName.invalidLength: First name must be between 2 and 100 characters.

lastName.invalidSymbols: Last name can only contains alphabetic characters and spaces.
lastName.invalidLength: Last name must be between 2 and 100 characters.

email.invalidEmail: It is not a well-formed email, should be a valid email.

image.invalidImageFormat: Image has invalid format. Supported formats are: png, jpg and jpeg.
image.invalidImageSize: Image can not be greater than 1MB.

cellphone.invalidCellphone: Cellphone must be ten digits or empty.

birthday.invalidSymbols: Birthday can only contains digits and slash('/').
birthday.invalidLength: Birthday must have exactly ten characters.
birthday.invalidPastDate: Birthday must be a valid past date.

match.friendlyTooltip:
Friendly does not requires an account to join the match.
Does not impacts winrate.
match.competitiveTooltip:
Competitive requires an account to join the match.
Impacts winrate.

home.cantFindMatch: Can't find the match you are looking for?
home.wantToCreateMatch: Want to create your own match?
home.filtersToolTip:
To add more than one filter at once you can write them splited by spaces.
You will get the results that matches with at least one filter of each type.

errorPage.404: This is not the page you are looking for.

createMatchForm.competitivityTooltip:
Friendly does not requires an account to join the match.
Does not impacts winrate.

Competitive requires an account to join the match.
Impacts winrate.

title.invalidSymbols: Title can have alphanumeric symbols, spaces and the following characters '¿?¡!-_.'
title.invalidLength: Title must be between 4 and 100 characters length.

date.invalidFutureDate: Date must be a valid future date.

time.invalidTime: From must be a valid time.

description.invalidLength: Decription can not have more than 140 characters.

sportName.invalidSymbols: Sport name can only contains alphanumeric.
sportName.invalidLength: Sport name must be between 4 and 100 characters.

displayName.invalidSymbols: Display name can only contains alphanumeric symbols or spaces.
displayName.invalidLength: Display name must be between 4 and 100 characters.

playersPerTeam.invalidSymbols: Players per team must contain only digits.
playersPerTeam.invalidLength: Players per team must be between 1 and 3 digits long.
playersPerTeam.invalidValue: Player per teams must have a value between 1 and 100.

image.invalidImageFormat: Image has invalid format. Supported formats are: png, jpg and jpeg.
image.invalidImageSize: Image can not be greater than 1MB.

confirmAccount.confirmed: Congratulations! You have created a new account.
confirmAccount.confirmEmail: An email has been sent to you to confirm your account.
confirmAccount.alreadyConfirmed: Your account has already been confirmed.

confirmAsistance.confirm: An email has been sent to you to confirm your assistance.
confirmAsistance.confirmed:
You have confirmed your assistance to the match.
An email has been sent to you to cancel your assistance.

cancelAsistance.canceled: You have cancelled your asistance to the match.
